overview: Saiful falls in love with Jasmin, a college gymnastic teacher who is adore by many others. Suleiman, a teakwando champion, is admired by many female student. Jasmin is saved by a mysterious man from being harassed by Frankie. She feels that she has found her Mr. Right. Both Sulaiman and Saiful claim to be the hero. A competition is held to see which of them is telling the truth.
title: Siapa Dia
